---
name: Security Review Request
about: Request security review for a change
title: '[SECURITY] '
labels: security
assignees: ''
---

## Change Description
What is being changed.

## Security Implications
Potential security impacts of this change.

## Checklist
- [ ] No downgrade paths introduced
- [ ] No bypass logic possible
- [ ] Constant-time comparisons maintained
- [ ] Replay protection unaffected
- [ ] Error messages don't leak sensitive data

## Test Vectors
List any new test vectors added.

## Reviewer Notes
Any specific areas to focus review on.
